mapper.select: select sum(score) from score where stuNo=#{stuNo}
select count(*) from score where stuNo = #{stuNo}
select sum(credit) from course where courseNo in (select DISTINCT courseNo from score where stuNo = #{stuNo})
select * from course where courseNo IN (select courseNo from student where stuNo = #{stuNo})

select score.stuNo as stuNo, score.courseNo as courseNo, score.term as term, score.score as score, course.courseName as courseName from score left join course on score.courseNo = course.courseNo where score.stuNo = #{stuNo}
